name: call of modern halo: shoot a man
name_original: call of modern halo: shoot a man
description:
Controls:
    • Movement is controlled by W, A, S, D. (W moves you forward, A to the left and D to the right, and S moves you backward)
    • To shoot your gun, press left-click. 
Developers: Ya'akov Goldberg, Ethan Hoffman, Salem Najera Credits:

Cover image courtesy of Google Images

Font and map assets courtesy of the Unity asset store
